message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. I'm willing to pay $95 for it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose $100 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment to meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $102.50.
